Titulo: Good for a couple of hours
Review: This was a good way to get out of the heat for a couple of hours. As well as shopping, we visited Ripleys museum which was small but interesting and also went up the wheel which gave great views. From a shopping point of view they seemed to cater to both the high street and designer markets
Muy bonita la plaza, la experiencia en el carrito de golf incre√≠ble con Ricardo! Muy bonitas las tiendas que hay y muy amable la gente.
Great service, fast and friendly service. Will definitely recommend to use. The mall is very spacious with many department stores this is a great amenity to have.
Muy buen dise√±o,y explendor!! Es un espacio al aire libre , Locales muy bien puestos con aire acondicionado ,hermoso paseo y compras,todas las marcas. Lugares para tomar algo o comer

Titulo: Lindo pero no pierde el toque de tianguis
Review: Muy insistentes y fastidiosos los que ofrecen tours. Se entiende que est√°n haciendo la labor para vender sus servicios, pero deben entender que uno ‚Äúno gracias‚Äù significa no. Provocar e increpar no solo ahuyenta, sino que logra que se les mande a un baile a Chalma.

Titulo: Place to have a good time with your loved ones üôÉ‚ú®
Review: This place is one where I like to spend time with my loved ones, starting in the aquarium and going through all the stalls to buy anything... at night life in roulette is incredible and the museum distracts not enough to attract attention but, it fulfills its objective of distracting... I recommend it

La Isla Shopping Village was a great surprise during our trip to Cancun! It‚Äôs a beautiful open-air shopping center with a relaxed, vacation vibe and a fantastic location right by the water.There‚Äôs a great variety of shops ‚Äì from international brands to local boutiques ‚Äì so whether you're after fashion, souvenirs, or skincare, you'll find something. The prices are very reasonable, actually quite similar to what you'd expect in Europe, which makes it easy to enjoy some guilt-free retail therapy.The staff in the shops were all super friendly and helpful, without being pushy ‚Äì a nice touch that made browsing really enjoyable.Bonus points for the setting: the canals, fountains, and waterfront restaurants make it feel more like a resort than a mall.Whether you‚Äôre shopping, dining, or just strolling with a gelato, La Isla is definitely worth a visit if you're in Cancun!

The YSL store is running a scam. I bought a nice purse there that they claimed would be tax free since I would receive credit in a few weeks on my American Express. I gave them tons of info including my social and flight info, I have never received my credit. DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS STORE!

What a great place to visit, if only to avoid the heat. This is a large outdoor shopping mall with many high end designer shops. Everything from Prada, Louis Vuitton, to Burberry and Armani. They offer multiple restaurants found throughout the mall. With the temperature on the rise, we found ourselves visiting the gelato shop twice during our time here. Maybe next time we‚Äôll look into the Ferris wheel. You‚Äôd probably get some nice elevated photos of the mall and the lagoon.
This is a very nice shopping mall with luxury stores. A good place to explore, do some shopping, grab a snack or a drink, and continue with the day's plans.

Titulo: Good place to go to escape the heat and the sun
Review: We came here mid-day our first day to escape the bright sun and mid-day heat. The shopping center is very pretty.We went into the Lego store, got fish pedicures, went on the Ferris Wheel (air conditioned) and went to the Ripley's Believe it or Not Museum ($3 more with the ticket to the ferris wheel).
Excelente y con ganas de  de volver para conocer nuevos lugares que no recorr√≠Era necesario tener un lindo descanso en  plato del Carmen

Titulo: A nice outdoor mall... for the most part.
Review: Nice outdoor mall with a good selection of stores.  Security is very visible.  We went on the Ferris Wheel and ate at Johnny Rockets and grabbed coffee at Starbucks.  Just 1 salesperson yelled at us to try and sell us something.  Overall, a good experience.  The only negative thing I have to say about the mall is the disgusting dolphin experience they have at their aquarium.  They really need to join the 21st century and ban that basura.  :'(

1st time visit to this complex, a great selection of shops from very high end to more of the everyday shops.Very clean and felt very safe, with security patrolling the complex. Various places to eat/drink and an aquarium and a fairground big wheel.Well worth a trip.
Tiene marcas como HYM, BERSKA, PULL & BEAR, Nike, ADIDAS,CROCS tienen buenas promociones y se puede pagar con d√≥lares o tarjetas de d√©bito o cr√©dito
Hermoso shopping que armoniza espacios de diversi√≥n , compras y muy buenos restaurantes, de variadas comidas. Hermosa la fuente y el puente. La limpieza excepcional

Titulo: Very limited wheelchair scooter and stroller accessible
Review: Wheelchair access always and issue and strollers 3 times in 1.5 years always have an issue with one of the elevators so you can‚Äôt access La Isla 1 to La Isla 2 ‚Ä¶ try another mall for accessibility

Titulo: Shopping, entertainment, restaurants, bars, Skywheel and even more
Review: Wednesday 30th October and we took the local bus from our Hotel Riu Palace Los Americas to the extensive shopping village, La Isla Canc√∫n. The bus fare was 12 Pesos (roughly fifty pence).It's located in the Hotel Zone, along Nichupte and Boj√≥rquez Lagoon.Would not say we visited here, it was more of an expedition and not just a quick in and out.We started off in La Botique Palacio, this was definitely high end shopping with stores like Louis Vuitton, Bottega Veneta, Balenciaga, Marc Jacobs, Giorgio Armani, Gucci¬†and many others. There were armed guards on duty in this sector, in fact when we were here, there were more guards than shoppers.There were other well know brands such as Abercrombie & Fitch, Prada, Lacoste and many more. Not all of the stores are high end and branded, there are numerous souvenir shops and other outlets to be visited.There are a wide variety restaurants, bars, coffee shops and other eateries. Senor Frogs bar and restaurant, McDonald's and Starbucks are some of the many food and drink outlets. There are both indoor and outdoor dining courtyards.There were a series of bridges that spanned waterways that linked various sections of the complex. Along one of the canals was a blue and white stripped lighthouse, it is actually a restaurant.We walked along the Coloured Walk (reviewed separately) which links two areas of the complex.Throughout the complex there are a number of features and fountains including Ballerina Fountain and La Isla Circle There a number of other attractions to be visited here including the Aquarium, with it's interactive touch tanks and over a thousand species on display.It is also home to the Canc√∫n Wax Museum with it's exhibits of the rich and famous.Ripley's Believe it or not is also here with hundreds of unbelievable but true artifacts, interactive games and stories. There is also a Casino The Skywheel with it's thirty-five gondolas is a standout feature and at seventy metres high it dominates the skyline and is visible from some distance. The fare is in the region of $15 (US).
Todo excelente Incre√≠ble experiencia La Sra Patrica del √°rea de luxury fue muy atenta y con mucha pasiencia me explic√≥ y me sac√≥ de todas mis dudas

This was the center of our activities outside of our resort. It has multiple sections like luxury, fashion, entertainment and dining.  With armed security guards on patrol we felt very safe here.What made this shopping mall special for us was the number and variety of restaurants. We ate at one almost every night of our trip.
Hermoso centro comercial, tiene las marcas m√°s exclusivas del mercado y muchas m√°s ‚Ä¶Moderno, amplio y limpio. Excelente lugar para recorrer y hacer compras en el tiempo libre.

Review: Lugar para visitar una sola ves en la vida, no tienen sillas o sillones, exceso de vendedores parece tianguis muy mal.  Parecen extorsionadores

($ 45 por trayecto para 2 personas). Hab√≠a algo de tr√°fico, pero lleg√≥ alrededor de la 1 pm. Un mont√≥n de bonitas tiendas y salir. Solo un ligero negativo: Canc√∫n es famoso por los tiburones que intentan que veas una presentaci√≥n Multipropiedad. Mi esposa compr√≥ un vestido de H&M de $35 a la venta por $200 mil millones de pesos ($10 . 20 ) . Robo del a√±o. Se puso tan caliente que paramos para H√§agen - Dazs muy agradable. Recuerdos abundantes pero muy agradables. Gritar a Marco desde Canc√∫n - Taxi. Excelente servicio. El veh√≠culo era viejo, pero no nos importaba. Marco se asegur√≥ de que nos dejaran y nos recogieran sin problemas. Me divert√≠ mucho. Canc√∫n es muy hermoso no puede esperar a volver.

Paramos en el Crown Paradise, muy recomendable. El agua hermosa, transparente, pero en la playa del hotel no hay nada de sombra, casi que no se pod√≠a estar de tanto sol, calcinante. Porque hace calor todo el tiempo. Las olas son un poco fuertes a veces, as√≠ que tampoco pod√©s estar siempre en el agua. La ciudad de Canc√∫n es sencilla, no es un balneario. Conocimos Isla mujeres (bell√≠sima), Xcaret (s√≥lo los r√≠os subterr√°neos recomendables), varios Cenotes (impresionantes, muy recomendables), Playa del Carmen (lindo balneario, pero la playa no estaba linda), Valladolid (hermoso) y Chichen Itz√° (impresionante). Nos falt√≥ conocer otras playas y otras ruinas, yo hubiera preferido parar en un hotel s√≥lo con desayuno y pasear por otras playas. Para otra vez!!!

Review: No hay mucha tienda local. F√°cil de aparcar y pagar.Si est√° buscando comprar algo que le falta, esto podr√≠a resolver su necesidad. Pero para hacer un buen trato - no

Hay muchos tipos de tiendas diferentes, desde H&M, Zara, Massimo Duty, Armani Exchange, hasta Jaime Ibiza (aut√©ntica marca mexicana), y mi favorita, Victoria Secret,‚Ä¶ Starbucks, H√§agen - Dazs, para tomar un respiro.

Es f√°cil llegar tomando un autob√∫s R 2 o R 2 por 12 pedos en zona hotelera. Precios m√°s altos que en Canad√° en la mayor√≠a de las tiendas. Los ba√±os est√°n muy limpios.

Caminando por la isla: hay una chica en un carrito que regala aguas a los visitantes, nos acercamos (mi esposo y yo) a pedirle una y sin dudarlo nos mir√≥ de arriba abajo y dudo en darnos el agua, nos dijo: ¬øustedes est√°n visitando la ISLA?: Llev√°bamos bolsas de compras. era evidente que si. Was there some months ago. Being from Argentina, saw some very nice high end stores we don‚Äôt normally get down here. Titulo: Lindo centro de compras, aunque no para visitarlo en horas de calor

A este centro de compras lo hab√≠amos visitado en otro viaje hace algunos a√±os y nos encant√≥, pero esta vez encontramos gran parte en reformas y solo pudimos recorrer las zonas con acceso, los cuales, al llegar cerca del mediod√≠a con mucho calor y un sol abrasador, fue inc√≥modo porque no contaba con sectores con sombra ni asientos disponibles para descansar.  Ofrece estacionamiento en el mismo predio y tiene tiendas diversas, locales de esparcimiento y gastronom√≠a, aunque varios estaban cerrados. Igual, dimos unas vueltas y pudimos ver las novedades y refacciones. La ambientaci√≥n es agradable con canales de agua y puentecitos.Creo que lo ideal hubiera sido ir por la tarde, para poder disfrutar relajados sin el calor agobiante.

Review: La isla es un lugar muy divertido. Un d√≠a te encuentras una fiesta, otro d√≠a un personaje en moto. Pero definitivamente es el coraz√≥n de la zona hotelera.

Review: Good open air mall.  Has several shops, mostly women's, sunglasses, pharmacy, and souvenirs. There are 2 nice restaurants and several mid-range restaurants in a wide variety of food.   An aquarium is also on site for small children.

Don‚Äôt go-  La Isla is going through construction and I made mistake of taking visiting family to see the sunset and have dinner.  We missed sunset because the parking deck elevator didn‚Äôt work, had to wheel visitor through the down lane of deck.  Eventually around front located wheelchair access to shopping area.  Missed the sunset üåÖ Wanted to get cash for the great saxophone player after dinner except every cash machine in La Isla was NOT working!After dinner returned to deck for another nightmare.  After splitting up family and someone walking up deck for car we discovered the ticket payment machine was broken too!After picking up wheelchair visitor from sidewalk we approached parking booth.  Held us for 20 minutes because the payment machine was cash only because of broken machine!  We didn‚Äôt have much cash between us.  After requesting a supervisor, no one arrives for 20 minutes so one visitor asked if they could transfer money to the employee and they pay?  Yes, and after sending money to employee we were able to leave.  I‚Äôm definitely posting this to TripAdvisor because no one else should experience this in paradise. The management should not be charging for parking when elevators and ticket pay kiosk aren‚Äôt working and construction barriers and materials are in parking deck.  Looked like greed to me!
